com.epimorphics.jsonrdf

Interface JSONWriterFacade

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JSONWriterObject, JSONWriterWrapper

    public interface JSONWriterFacade
    Interface to look like a JSONWriter. Used to migrate code which used to use JSONWriter to allow it to do object construction. Also allows us to switch between the codehaus version of json.org API which Jersey expects and the more up to date json.org version which we used to use and has advantages (read from stream, better quoting etc).
    Version:
    $Revision: $
    Author:
    Dave Reynolds

    • Method Detail

      • array

        JSONWriterFacade array()
        Begin appending a new array. All values until the balancing endArray will be appended to this array. The endArray method must be called to mark the array's end.
        Returns:
        this

      • endArray

        JSONWriterFacade endArray()
        End an array. This method most be called to balance calls to array.
        Returns:
        this

      • endObject

        JSONWriterFacade endObject()
        End an object. This method most be called to balance calls to object.
        Returns:
        this

      • key

        JSONWriterFacade key(String s)
        Append a key. The key will be associated with the next value. In an object, every value must be preceded by a key.
        Parameters:
        s - A key string.
        Returns:
        this

      • object

        JSONWriterFacade object()
        Begin appending a new object. All keys and values until the balancing endObject will be appended to this object. The endObject method must be called to mark the object's end.
        Returns:
        this

      • value

        JSONWriterFacade value(boolean b)
        Append either the value true or the value false.
        Parameters:
        b - A boolean.
        Returns:
        this

      • value

        JSONWriterFacade value(double d)
        Append a double value.
        Parameters:
        d - A double.
        Returns:
        this

      • value

        JSONWriterFacade value(long l)
        Append a long value.
        Parameters:
        l - A long.
        Returns:
        this

      • value

        JSONWriterFacade value(Object o)
        Append an object value.
        Parameters:
        o - The object to append. It can be null, or a Boolean, Number, String, JSONObject, or JSONArray, or an object with a toJSONString() method.
        Returns:
        this
